rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Foyer
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with wheelchair accessible design, ensuring smooth transitions to main living areas.

rooms.name: Contemporary Living Room
rooms.description: Open space designed for relaxation and gatherings, incorporating natural light with Vastu orientation principles favoring the east-west axis.

rooms.name: Modern Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen integrated with dining area, adhering to local building norms and Vastu guidelines by positioning cooking area in the southeast corner.

rooms.name: Primary Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible bathroom featuring grab bars and ample turning space for safety and compliance with accessibility standards.

openings.description: Main entrance door with wheelchair ramp integrated for accessibility.
Large window for natural light and ventilation in the living room.
Window leading to a small balcony space offering a view of the garden.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with built-in storage and ample natural light, positioned according to Vastu for restful energy.

rooms.name: Studio Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional sleeping area integrated within the duplex layout ensuring privacy and efficient space usage.

openings.description: Window providing east-facing natural light, adhering to Vastu for health and energy.
Window in the studio bedroom offering natural light and ventilation.
Hallway connecting bedrooms with an accessible design for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive terrace with garden integration and privacy features; designed for relaxation and outdoor living.

openings.description: Accessible staircase with handrails leading to the rooftop terrace.
